name: Delicious Bulle Souffle
desc: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. It all starts with that glorious, fluffy mouthfeel. Then comes the rich eggy aroma and fruity-fresh flavor suffusing your mouth, as if you had plunged headfirst into pillowy clouds, such that the very air sings with subtle sweetness.

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

customize.name: Recipe: Bulle Souffle
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Bulle Souffle.

customize.name: Bulle Souffle
customize.desc: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. Pour the beaten egg whites into a Bulle Fruit skin that has been scraped empty, and bake it until the souffle has evenly expanded. The word "Bulle" isn't a part of the name just because it's in the ingredient list, but because the finished product allows the tongue to delight in bubble-like spongy softness.

customize.name: Suspicious Bulle Souffle
customize.desc: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. You could not resist sneaking a peek as this baked, only to see the expanding souffle collapse speedily... It seems that curiosity not only kills cats, but ruins cakes too.

customize.name: Delicious Bulle Souffle
customize.desc: A very small cake nestled within a Bulle Fruit skin. It all starts with that glorious, fluffy mouthfeel. Then comes the rich eggy aroma and fruity-fresh flavor suffusing your mouth, as if you had plunged headfirst into pillowy clouds, such that the very air sings with subtle sweetness.

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.
